title: 100% HYPERCRAFT SQ is Catnip for Big Shade Lovers
content:
If you’re wooed by big sunglasses and thirsty for an upgrade, listen up. 100% recently released a new version of its HYPERCRAFT sunglasses — the HYPERCRAFT SQ. The “SQ” stands for square, which is the design principle these shades follow. The laser-cut, chemical-resistant nylon lenses are also rimless.

When taken together, 100% claims the size, shape, and design of the shades provide “a unique fit” and an “extensive field of vision for unmatched protection from all angles.”

But all that size and protection comes with a surprising bonus: HYPERCRAFT SQs weigh in at a svelte 23 grams.

Other features include UV400 protection, a hydrophobic and oleophobic lens treatment, and air scoops at the temples. The glasses also come with a hard case, a microfiber cleaning bag, and an alternative fit nose pad.

The HYPERCRAFT SQ is currently available in five color combinations: the “crimson” lens/gray earpiece variant shown above, plus three variations in somewhat brighter and louder shades.

Available now, the HYPERCRAFT SQs start at $165 for Matte Black with a Smoke lens, then $175 for the Black mirror lens, or $195 for the HiPER Multilayer lenses or HiPER Crimson Silver Mirror lens.

100percent.com

The post 100% HYPERCRAFT SQ is Catnip for Big Shade Lovers appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
